name: Build Android APK

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, master ]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v5
      with:
        python-version: '3.11'

    - name: Install system dependencies
      run: |
        sudo apt-get update
        sudo apt-get install -y \
          python3-pip \
          build-essential \
          git \
          ffmpeg \
          libsdl2-dev \
          libsdl2-image-dev \
          libsdl2-mixer-dev \
          libsdl2-ttf-dev \
          libportmidi-dev \
          libswscale-dev \
          libavformat-dev \
          libavcodec-dev \
          zlib1g-dev \
          libgstreamer1.0-dev \
          gstreamer1.0-plugins-base \
          gstreamer1.0-plugins-good \
          libffi-dev \
          libssl-dev \
          autoconf \
          automake \
          libtool \
          pkg-config \
          cmake \
          ninja-build \
          unzip \
          zip \
          openjdk-17-jdk

    - name: Set JAVA_HOME
      run: |
        echo "JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64" >> $GITHUB_ENV

    - name: Install Python dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install buildozer cython virtualenv

    - name: Install Android SDK/NDK via Buildozer
      run: |
        buildozer android debug 2>&1 | head -100 || true
      continue-on-error: true

    - name: Build APK
      run: |
        yes | buildozer android debug
      timeout-minutes: 60

    - name: Upload APK artifact
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: youtube-limiter-apk
        path: bin/*.apk
        retention-days: 30

    - name: Create Release (on tag)
      if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/')
      uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v1
      with:
        files: bin/*.apk
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
